long_description: Choose the prAna Bhakti Yoga Mat bag for easy travel to and from class with your yoga mat, phone, wallet and other small necessities. Side storage pocket lets you stash a few small essentials. Sling the prAna Bhakti Yoga Mat bag over a shoulder and adjust the strap length to suit you. Yoga mat sold separately.
short_description: Choose the prAna Bhakti Yoga Mat bag for easy travel to and from class with your yoga mat, phone, wallet and other small necessities.
